text: $MSFT $GOOGL If earnings and forecasts are good, that will help mitigate the negative slide, however it may only be temporary 1-2 days before rolling down the hill again; this time with no saving life line unless special news comes out (like Google’s split, but they shot their load, so we’ll see what Microsoft has to say. They are overdue for a split as well, but if does I hope its much later - Q42022/Q12023).

$MSFT As long as the 1/25 low remains intact, the instrument remains in the sideways zone.  We don’t like to trade the sideways area, only like to trade the extreme areas in 3, 7 or 11 swing.   It is favouring more downside is taking place in the next cycle lower.  #Elliottwave #Trading #Stocks

$AMD This is not a "told you so" post but maybe something to help some people raise money in other sectors. We started buying $NCLH on March 4th, 7th and 8th. The rotation out of tech started well before that, leading to targeting sectors that were defensive or just had not come back from pre-pandemic levels. Airlines and cruise lines have a long way to go on the upside but I believe have limited downside at these levels. I'm still waiting to get back into $AMD, $MU, $MSFT etc...But purchases of $NCLH and $UAL have proven there are other sectors to ease the drops...
